https://tmrev.io/movie/709063-BlackJack: Ghosts 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/nOrAtPmMDQDxfrB3wF6J5KMjGVV.jpg Nearly 20 years ago a young mother was shot during an apparent kidnapping and subsequent police chase. Now after all that time, the man in jail for the murder is about to be paroled. Jack has two missions - to bring the father and his daughter back together and to find out if any justice has been done by the conviction. BlackJack: Ghosts
